---
title: BatSync 
subtitle: BatSync - syndicating archives of bat call data 
date: 2025-08
author: "[Jo Walsh](/people/jo.html)"

abstract: |
  BatSync is an application funded as part of Natural England's "data mobilisation" efforts to make opportunistic data, collected by enthusiasts, available to the global biodiversity monitoring record. 
  
  RSE contributions include developing a research prototype into a robust and scalable cloud-based service, facilitating workshops with a Steering Group of stakeholders, and working with Digital Research semantics specialists to support and develop well-known community standards for bat call metadata
